text: Saint-Florent-des-Bois is a former commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. On 1 January 2016, it became a part of the new commune of Rives-de-l'Yon.Arrêté préfectoral 28 December 2015 ==References== Category:Former communes in Vendée
title: Saint-Florent-des-Bois
